mapper.select: SELECT PD.PDC_CODE,PD.PD_CODE,PD.PD_NAME,PD.PD_DATE,PD.PD_PRICE,SUM(OH.OH_CNT) AS OH_CNT FROM ORDER_HISTORY AS OH JOIN ORDER_AND_CREDIT AS OAC JOIN PRODUCT AS PD ON OAC.BD_DATE = OH.BD_DATE AND OH.PDC_CODE = PD.PDC_CODE AND OAC.C_CODE = OH.C_CODE AND PD.C_CODE = OAC.C_CODE AND OH.PD_CODE = PD.PD_CODE AND OAC.OAC_NUM = OH.OAC_NUM WHERE OAC.C_CODE = #{c_code} AND PD.PD_STATUS = "1" AND OAC.OAC_NUM = #{oac_num} AND OAC.BD_DATE =#{bd_date} GROUP BY PD.PDC_CODE,PD.PD_CODE HAVING OH_CNT > 0
SELECT OH.PDC_CODE,OH.PD_CODE,OH.PD_DATE,SUM(OH_CNT) FROM ORDER_HISTORY AS OH WHERE OH.C_CODE = #{c_code} AND BD_DATE = #{bd_date} AND OH.OAC_NUM = #{oac_num} GROUP BY OH.PDC_CODE,OH.PD_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_HISTORY AS OH JOIN STOCK AS STK ON OH.PDC_CODE = STK.PDC_CODE AND OH.PD_CODE = STK.PD_CODE SET STK.STK_STOCK = (STK.STK_STOCK-(#{oh_cnt})) WHERE OH.C_CODE =#{c_code} AND OH.OAC_NUM = #{oac_num} AND OH.PDC_CODE = #{pdc_code} AND OH.PD_CODE = #{pd_code} AND STK.STK_STOCK >=0
mapper.select: SELECT PRO.SKC_CODE,PRO.SK_NUM,PRO.PDC_CODE,PRO.PD_CODE,CAST(PRO.PD_DATE AS CHAR) AS PD_DATE,PRO.PD_IMGNAME,PRO.PD_NAME,PRO.PD_PRICE, ifnull(STK.STK_STOCK,-1) AS STK_STOCK FROM (SELECT SK.SKC_CODE,SK.SK_NUM,PRO.PDC_CODE,PRO.PD_CODE,PRO.PD_DATE,PRO.PD_IMGNAME,PRO.PD_NAME,PRO.PD_PRICE FROM PRODUCT PRO LEFT OUTER JOIN SELLKEY SK ON PRO.C_CODE=SK.C_CODE AND PRO.PD_CODE=SK.PD_CODE AND PRO.PDC_CODE=SK.PDC_CODE AND PRO.PD_DATE=SK.PD_DATE WHERE PRO.C_CODE=#{c_code} AND PRO.PD_STATUS='1' AND SK_NUM IS NOT NULL ) PRO LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK STK ON PRO.PDC_CODE=STK.PDC_CODE AND PRO.PD_CODE=STK.PD_CODE AND PRO.PD_DATE=STK.PD_DATE ORDER BY PRO.PDC_CODE ASC,PRO.PD_CODE ASC;
